page.title: 10Clubs - Brownies,Cubs,Guides
page.content: Brownies - 20 girls, aged 7 to 10, belong to the 1st. Gorran Church Brownies.They meet at 5.30 p.m. every Thursday in the Church Rooms, they play games and work for interest badges. Most girls go on from here to join the Guides. St. Goran Guide group has 17 members aged 10 to 15, meeting every Friday in the Church Rooms from 5.30 to 7.30p.m. The aim is to teach the girls camp skills, cooking, cleaning etc., and to develop a caring attitude. Cubs - There has been a Cub Pack here for many years; at the moment there are 10 to 15 members, aged 8 to 11 years. They meet every Wednesday, from 6 to 7.30p.m., in the Church Rooms. The emphasis is on achievement and enjoyment. There is no Scout group at Gorran, the nearest is at Mevagissey, 5 miles away.
